title: Robot Revolution - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/18/20
itunes:title: Robot Revolution - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/18/20
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and robotics instructor Dennis Kambeitz explore his theories about the coming changes to the economy as more jobs are replaced by automation, and why it is important to get training and education now to adapt to the new technology.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
